name: pgipte2
description: Price reduction tool for Path of Exile 2

scripts.package: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Path 'node_modules/node-global-key-listener/bin/MacKeyServer' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path 'node_modules/node-global-key-listener/bin/*.dylib' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path 'pgipte2.exe' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npx caxa --input . --output pgipte2.exe --exclude '.git' --exclude '*.md' --exclude '*.exe' --exclude 'dist' -- '{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node' '{{caxa}}/node_modules/tsx/dist/cli.mjs' '{{caxa}}/src/index.ts'"
scripts.release: powershell -Command "$version = (Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; & 'C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh' release create v$version pgipte2.exe --title v$version --notes ('Release v' + $version + ' - Standalone executable for Windows')"
